committees.committee: House Post Office and Civil Service

official_title: A bill to amend chapter 11 of title 5, United States Code, to prohibit a U.S. Civil Service Commissioner from engaging in any other business or employment.

summary.text: Prohibits a United States Civil Service Commissioner from engaging in any other business or employment. (Amends 5 USC 1101)

titles.title: A bill to amend chapter 11 of title 5, United States Code, to prohibit a U.S. Civil Service Commissioner from engaging in any other business or employment.
